name: atlasctl
description: Atlassian CLI for Confluence page exports with comments

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && bun build src/main.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --target node --format esm && printf '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' | cat - dist/cli.js > dist/cli.tmp && mv dist/cli.tmp dist/cli.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js
